name: Toddlers Program
description: Two toddler groups both 8am - 5:30pm dividing children by age. The Young Toddlers are from ages 1 - 2 years old and the Toddlers are ages 2 - 3 years old.
fullDescription: Two toddler groups both 8am - 5:30pm dividing children by age. The Young Toddlers are from ages 1 - 2 years old and the Toddlers are ages 2 - 3 years old.
whatTheyOffer: Two toddler groups both 8am - 5:30pm dividing children by age. The Young Toddlers are from ages 1 - 2 years old and the Toddlers are ages 2 - 3 years old.
howToGetIt: For admissions information visit their website. There you can take virtual tour and [register to take an in person tour] (https://www.thegrowingtreeschool.com/cont.phpinquire) and make the follow up appointments to continue the admissions process.
cost: This is a fee based service.
